options.name: Iron Husk
options.description: The model's Resilience is set to 6.

options.name: Mirrored Scales
options.description: Each Close Combat Attack allocated towards the model for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to hit is distributed onto the attacking model's Health Pool.

options.name: Kaleidoscopic Flesh
options.description: The model gains Hard Target (1).

options.name: Mark of the Eternal Champion
options.description: If the bearer is not a Wizard, it becomes a Wizard Apprentice that does not select spells as normal but always knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell). If the bearer is already a Wizard, it knows Spear of Infinity in addition to its other spells and cannot select it during Spell Selection.

options.name: Hammer Hand
options.description: The model gains +1 Attack Value.

options.name: Unnatural Roots
options.description: A side with one or more models with Unnatural Roots Engaged in Combat when Combat Scores are calculated adds +1 to its Combat Score.

options.name: Brimstone Secretions
options.description: The model gains Immune (Divine Attacks).

options.name: Centipede Legs
options.description: The model gains +2" March Rate.

options.name: Chitinous Scales
options.description: The model gains +2 Armour, to a maximum of 3.

options.name: Dark Hide
options.description: The model gains Scout with the following exception: it must be deployed fully inside the owner's Deployment Zone, and the owner must have deployed at least one unit normally.

options.name: Living Shield
options.description: The model gains Parry.

options.name: Piercing Spike
options.description: Close Combat Attacks made by the model gain +1 Armour Penetration.

options.name: Greenfire Eyes
options.description: Units containing one or more models with Greenfire Eyes must reroll any natural rolls of ‘1’ when rolling for Charge Range and Pursuit Distance.

options.name: Venom Sacs
options.description: The model gains Poison Attacks. If the model's Close Combat Attacks already were Poison Attacks from another source than this Manifestation, they wound automatically on a successful natural to-hit roll of '5' or '6', unless the target has Immune (Poison Attacks).

options.name: Digestive Vomit
options.description: The first time the model is on the winning side of a combat, it gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration until the end of the game.

options.name: Broodmother
options.description: For each Health Point loss the model causes with Close Combat Attacks against enemy units, roll a D6 at the end of the Initiative Step. For each rolled 6+, the model's Health Pool Raises 1 Health Point.

options.name: Unhinging Jaw
options.description: Failed to-wound rolls from Close Combat Attacks against Large or Gigantic models made by the model must be rerolled.

options.name: Divining Snout
options.description: The model gains Devastating Charge (+2" Adv) for Charges against units that contain at least one Special Item. The effects only apply if all models in the unit are affected by Divining Snout.

options.name: Segmented Shell
options.description: When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), reduce X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

options.name: Smothering Coils
options.description: The model gains +1 to-wound with Close Combat Attacks against models with Scoring.

options.name: Mesmerising Plumage
options.description: Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this Manifestation suffer -1 Offensive Skill and -1 Defensive Skill.

options.name: Roaming Hands
options.description: While the unit is Engaged with an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing, the model gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

options.name: Hot Blood
options.description: The model gains Devastating Charge (+2 Agi).

options.name: Chilling Yawn
options.description: Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this Manifestation suffer -2 Agility.

options.name: Aura of Despair
options.description: The model gains Accurate.

options.name: Sorcerous Antennae
options.description: At the start of Siphon the Veil in each of your Magic Phases, choose a single model part in each unit with one or more instances of this Manifestation. The chosen model part gains Channel (1) until the end of the Magic Phase.

options.name: Whipcrack Tail
options.description: The model gains Lightning Reflexes.

options.name: Red Haze
options.description: The model's Close Combat Attacks gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration, but each of its Close Combat Attacks with a natural to-hit roll of ‘1’ is distributed onto the attacking model's Health Pool.

options.name: Incendiary Ichor
options.description: The model gains Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks). All Melee Attacks (including Special Attacks) and Shooting Attacks made by the model with Incendiary Ichor become Flaming Attacks. The model automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

options.name: Bronze Backbone
options.description: The model gains Hatred.

options.name: Stiff Upper Lip
options.description: Units with at least one model with this Manifestation gain Minimised (Discipline Tests).

options.name: Horns of Hubris
options.description: The model gains Vanguard (6").

options.name: Ledger of Souls
options.description: Immediately before removing a friendly model without Insignificant in a unit within 9" of the bearer's model due to enemy attacks, you gain one Veil Token for each Health Point that model had the first time it entered the Battlefield.

options.name: Gem of Faith's Tithe
options.description: Whenever the bearer attempts to cast a spell, the owner may choose a friendly Champion with Pledged to Darkness within 12". If so, use the position of the Champion when drawing Line of Sight and measuring range. For Direct spells, also use the Champion's Front Arc. The owner must use all of these or none at all.

options.name: Lugar's Dice
options.description: A single model part of the bearer's model can reroll a single failed to-hit, to-wound, or Armour Save roll per Player Turn. Crush Attacks are not affected.

options.name: Lifeforce Talisman
options.description: Whenever the bearer Miscasts, the owner may choose to inflict D3 hits on the bearer's unit. These hits wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If so, the owner may choose to apply a +1 or a -1 Miscast Modifier.

options.name: Scurrying Veil
options.description: The bearer's March Rate is set to 20". In addition, the bearer's model ignores friendly units when moving in the Charge and Movement Phase, but must follow the Unit Spacing rule at the end of the move.

options.name: Fiendish Snares
options.description: Immediately after Deployment Zones are chosen, the owner nominates a Terrain Feature other than Impassable Terrain or Open Terrain with its centre in their half of the Battlefield. The chosen Terrain Feature becomes Dangerous Terrain (2).

options.name: Crown of Hubris
options.description: At the start of any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer may choose to inflict 3 hits on its unit that wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If so, the owner gains 3 additional Veil Tokens.
